title: Cashmere Season Is Upon Us and This Everlane V-Neck Sweater Is Half Off
text:
1 item in this article Photo: courtesy of the retailer

You may have noticed some posts from our friends at the Strategist on the Cut. They’ll be dropping in every now and again, sharing their expertise on the basics you don’t have time to research and the weird and wonderful things you don’t yet know you need.

Last week, the Cut alerted us to the fact that now is the best time to stock up on cheap cashmere. And, certainly, in the case of Everlane, there are still quite a few of last season’s cashmere sweaters lingering in their Choose What You Pay section — including this ivory-colored, oversize, slouchy (slightly rounded) V-neck sweater. Said one happy reviewer: It feels “like I have my pajama top on … nice and comfortable.” And another: “Even though the fit is advertised as ‘oversized,’ I took a risk and still sized up for a really cozy oversized fit and it paid off — not sloppy, but just big enough I could pull it off with leggings if I wanted. The ivory is a great shade, the neckline is really nice.” So there you have it.

description: Today’s deal of the day is Everlane’s cashmere oversized v-neck sweater that’s on sale for 50 percent off.
